document_data.caption: A map Halruaa showing the River Maeru.
document_data.name: River Maeru
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Maeru''' was a small waterway found in eastern [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Geography: The river was formed from water leaving the southern edge of [[Lake Maeru]] and an unnamed tributary that originated in the [[Muaraghal Mountains]] in eastern Halruaa. It flowed west for approximately {{SI|200|miles|long=yes}} before reaching the southeastern rim of [[Lake Halruaa]].
